status.title: Status
status.content: Currently seeking challenging opportunities to continue expanding my skills, committed to learning new technologies and frameworks.

hobbies.content: I enjoy video games, researching and watching new technological trends in the gaming world and in the future creating my own video game, cooking, reading and exercising.

skills.content: As a software developer, my technical knowledge is based on a wide range of tools, languages, and frameworks that allow me to bring digital solutions to life.

intro.imageTitle: If I must fall, I will rise each time a better man.
intro.part2: Full-Stack Developer, Backend and Augmented Reality Apps.
intro.part3: I enjoy facing new challenges, working on multidisciplinary projects to add value through technology and provide creative solutions that not only solve problems efficiently but also generate strategic value in the long term.

education.title: Education
education.fimetitledip: MASTER'S DEGREE IN SOFTWARE ENGINEERING AND COMPUTER SYSTEMS

experience.title: Full Stack Jr Developer
description: - Using SQL for queries, modifications to OLAP cubes, views, dimensions, and relationships.
- Configuration and maintenance of Linux virtual machines for development environments.
- Participation in code reviews and testing to ensure software quality.
- Version control and team collaboration using GitHub.

experience.title: Systems Engineer
description: - DMS support in the management and resolution of technical incidents.
- Support for the Systems Department in creating users and modifying permissions.
- Maintenance of LAN and WAN servers.
- Performing software updates and monitoring server performance.
- Collaboration with internal teams to improve system efficiency.

experience.title: Developer / Project Management
description: - I improved project management using agile methodologies, which made production more efficient.
- Collaboration on projects presented in their main entry and on their official website.
- I led the creation of Virtual Reality environments with Unity.
- Project management based on agile methodologies (specializing in Scrum).
- Installation of servers, hardware, and software on workstations.

experience.title: General Assistant
description: - IT maintenance, ensuring systems run smoothly and minimizing user downtime.
- Report generation with SAP and manipulation of pivot tables.

footer.content: This page was built with Astro

personalskills.title: Personal Skills
personalskills.timecontent: Ability to organize and prioritize tasks efficiently
personalskills.teamcontent: Ability to work as a team, collaborate and communicate effectively
personalskills.problemcontent: Ability to identify and solve problems in a creative way
personalskills.comunicationcontent: Ability to express ideas, concepts in a clear and effective manner.
personalskills.proactivecontent: I am proactive and always look for opportunities to improve and contribute.
personalskills.empathycontent: Ability to adapt to different tools and work situations.

project.description: Contribution and continuous improvement of an immersive virtual tour platform for FIME, integrating Unity with web technologies to offer a browser-based interactive experience (contribution also for the web and mobile versions).

Application development for planning, recording, and tracking your workouts with integrated AI chat to generate routines. Users can create templates, record new exercises, import or export data, and use a calendar.

Developed in collaboration with Banorte, the application features a support portal, the ability to edit or add employees (photos, schedules, salaries), an administration interface to add or remove employees, and generate monthly payroll reports.

Development of an interactive web pokedex using PokéAPI with a retro design that allows users to search, filter, and explore information about all Pokémon, as well as export data to Excel and send it by email.
Website development in collaboration with Symtto, offering electrical services and installations, a store selling electrical products with an integrated payment gateway, and product details.

Contribution in conjunction with a school in Poland, with the aim of training operators in the safe use of a forklift truck and familiarizing them with the forks, fully operational with steering wheel, pedals, gear lever, and virtual reality.
Development of a website simulation. The site simulates an online video game store with product listings, search/filter functions, shopping cart, order viewing, and returns.
Contribution of a mobile application created in Android Studios to scan walls and obtain their exact color, with the possibility of saving the colors and photos and viewing them in the gallery.

Development of an arcade game inspired by Space Invaders with a choice of four difficulty levels, with scores and lives. I designed the progression of the levels and programmed them with increasing difficulty across four levels.
I developed an online store simulation with search, filtering, shopping cart features developed with Angular for the frontend and using the Fake Store API for the backend.
